MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH9 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it 5:19pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:01pm on Saturday, 20th February 2021
